title: When you know your main is outdated, but you don't want them to get an update

replies.body: UPDATES BITCH!!! :3
Careful, Rito might turn Cho'Gath's feast into a skill shot.
It would add counterplay though.

You do realize that range is counterplay too...? If you don't want to get feasted, stay out of range when you're at a certain health. It has a range of 175, saying it has no counterplay is like saying Leona's Q has no counterplay.
Never take anything on the Internet seriously, please.
Whoops, missed the kappa.

Kappa = anything having to do with "counterplay"
It became common sense in League of Legends after the Veigar nerfs.
Cho'Gath's Feast now shoots out teeth that hook onto nearby enemy units and pull them into his mouth giving him multiple stacks in the process.

Patch 5.8
* Everything is now a skillshot, even movement
"We thought that players had too much reliability in moving around the map, so we made each champions' foot a skillshot. We think this will separate the great from the good." - Scarizard

* We have decided to remove abilities from the game, as there were not enough controls. 
* QWER are now devoted to your champion's arms and legs. 
* Hecarim uses TY for his back legs 
* Elise and Skarner use QWERASDF and are not allowed to use summoner spells.
D:
But the damage increases base on your stacks.
#CounterPlay
I think about poor Poppy and just want to lay down my weapons now.
do... do you know something we don't know? .__.

Nope; poppy is slated for a rework. Into a tank.

RIP Diplomatic Immunity, you will be missed.

Nobody with any conscience will miss that skill.

It's basically the epitome of BS, point and click "I'm immune to everyone but the one person on your team with no CC", while she murders your most important team member.

Why does it have damage amplification? Who knows, but it helps her a lot in 1v1s.
Partially why Riot deemed it too toxic to stay and are removing it. It's annoying to everyone who isn't poppy and her team, which means that it should not be there.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YpPhsFEL,comment-id=00030000000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-21T21:34:58.236+0000)
>
> Partially why Riot deemed it too toxic to stay and are removing it. It's annoying to everyone who isn't poppy and her team, which means that it should not be there.

meanwhile Kalista's passive isn't toxic at all? :)
You mean where she shoves a spear into her allies and gets first blood?

I have not played against a Kalista.

... no seriously. I have *not* played against a kalista. I have heard what it does and it sounds like BS, but I really don't have first hand experience.

Honestly She's really easy to beat you just gotta play an ADC with a decent range and A lot of Slows.


Like Ashe.
keep it, just make it that only she and the person she ulted can damage each other. No more diving the entire enemy team cause you ulted the support

> [{quoted}](name=Bear Hat Alice,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YpPhsFEL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-21T18:20:43.304+0000)
>
> I think about poor Poppy and just want to lay down my weapons now.

I understand as a Poppy main ;*(
http://i.imgur.com/VyFBIkz.jpg

I main Miss Fortune and destroy games with her, I usually 9/10 times end up carrying and it's really nice for everyone to be stunned by how powerful she is. I like playing her largely because of her playstyle and personality but its also because she's so off meta.

I'm dreading the day people realize Miss Fortune has one of the best early and mid games out of every ADC and becomes popular. I mean really just her level 1 to 3 is unquestionable that she out damages every other ADC in the game.

> [{quoted}](name=ILoveTyranny,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YpPhsFEL,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-04-21T19:47:47.055+0000)
>
> I main Miss Fortune and destroy games with her, I usually 9/10 times end up carrying and it's really nice for everyone to be stunned by how powerful she is. I like playing her largely because of her playstyle and personality but its also because she's so off meta.
> 
> I'm dreading the day people realize Miss Fortune has one of the best early and mid games out of every ADC and becomes popular. I mean really just her level 1 to 3 is unquestionable that she out damages every other ADC in the game.

What are you even talking about? Miss Fortune has no mobility. No reliable form of escape. Her ultimate is extremely limiting and she's forced to stand in place while it is used...

Oh wait... you're Silver 5. Welp, have fun with her then! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Konidias,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YpPhsFEL,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2015-04-21T21:14:18.746+0000)
>
> What are you even talking about? Miss Fortune has no mobility. No reliable form of escape. Her ultimate is extremely limiting and she's forced to stand in place while it is used...
> 
> Oh wait... you're Silver 5. Welp, have fun with her then! :)

That seemed rather rude.

> [{quoted}](name=Baldur Odinson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YpPhsFEL,comment-id=000900010000,timestamp=2015-04-21T21:27:21.255+0000)
>
> That seemed rather rude.

Yeah well the guy talks like we're all idiots and don't see how "great" Miss Fortune is... and then he's nearly Bronze level and talking about "destroying games" with her. If he was winning 9 out of 10 games like he said then he definitely wouldn't still be Silver 5. That's all I'm saying. He wants to make exaggerated claims then I'm going to call him out on it.

Maybe I'm just also in a bad mood.

Understandably. This game gets frustrating. I roccomend playing exclusively with friends. Makes the game a LOT less Stressful.

And While I should preface this with "Drink Responsibly", League of Lagers is a Great way to enjoy LoL with Friends and Booze.

Cool, thanks for the link to a two year old guide.

Also a great example of a player you have there. Hasn't played a ranked game of Miss Fortune since season 3 where he won 2-10 games. :O You've sold me. Gonna go play MF right now!

1) That player has made it to Platinum II.

You haven't even made it to Platinum I.


2) That player has made a successful guide for {{champion:21}} . 

You haven't any guides.

While the guide may be old, this player is more experienced than you will ever be.
Except for Draven.  He has the highest potential Level 1 damage in the game.
#BANNEDEVERGAMEOFALLSTAR'S2013
Careful, they might give Veigar's stun a de- oh. Sad times.

Well Ori is kinda outdated. She is rarely used, except by me. I use her 7 out of 10 games. She's fun but incredibly weak early game. She honestly needs a buff. Her q and w are worthless until level 2. Then her e is fairly weak until 3. But you can't exactly focus on leveling that until you have 2 in q and w. 
What im saying is she's outdated because she is hard to play and weak unless used correctly. You can't just learn her over night.
That Baron steal from Unicorns of Love though might draw peoples attention to her.
leave them be riot just leave them be{{champion:31}} {{champion:90}}
I was going to make the same comment, so I'll just give you a +1.  Glad to find another fan of Cho and Malz.

I don't have a main but this is how I feel about GP. Will be a sad day when my pirate's playstyle will be no more and now I always get an eerie feeling when I hear update because I think of my poor disease infested troll.
Leave my gem master the way he is! He's perfect :){{champion:44}}
He is truly outrageous.
{{champion:4}} rip ult and targeted stun
He still has a targeted stun.....
I meant if he got his kit reworked. He'd probably lose it.
Nah, it's one of the only solid ways to land his Q and is seriously broadcasted. All you gotta do is back up normally. So I don't think he would ever lose it.
